dcterms:creator: Timo Hackel
Nikolay Savinov
Lubor Ladicky
Jan D Wegner
Konrad Schindler
Marc Pollefeys
dcterms:description: The Semantic3D dataset consists of 15 point clouds for training and 15 for online testing, with each point cloud containing up to 108 points, covering a real-world area of up to 160×240×30 meters. It includes 3D coordinates, RGB information, and intensity, and is used for semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: Semantic3D

dcterms:creator: Jens Behley
Martin Garbade
Andres Milioto
Jan Quenzel
Sven Behnke
Cyrill Stachniss
Juergen Gall
dcterms:description: SemanticKITTI consists of 43552 densely annotated LIDAR scans belonging to 21 sequences, with each scan being a large-scale point cloud containing approximately 105 points. It is used for semantic scene understanding and evaluation of semantic segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: SemanticKITTI

dcterms:creator: Iro Armeni
Sasha Sax
Amir R Zamir
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: The S3DIS dataset consists of 271 rooms belonging to 6 large areas, with each point cloud representing a medium-sized single room (approximately 20×15×5 meters) and containing dense 3D points. It is used for indoor scene understanding and semantic segmentation.
dcterms:title: S3DIS
